title: Looking for typefaces similar to the Allianz logo
content: I am trying for a week now to figure out a similar typeface to the one used in [Allianz](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023204643/http:/www.allianz.com/Az_Cnt/az/_any/cma/contents/604000/saObj_604130_allianz_blauaufweiss_teaser.gif) logotype. I know this one is most certainly cusom (judging by the overall look and by the connection to the symbol) but I was thinking there might be similar typefaces to it.
author: george

comments.content: Dunno about the semiserif riff going on there, but as far as basic structure goes, [ITC Quay Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023204643/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=ITC.108281.0.7&attributes.sampleSize=24&sampleText=Allianz&sampleSize=32) is roughly similar.
Actually, I need to figure out how a capital "T" should look to fit alongside Allianz style. Ela Demiserif is a good inspiraton, thank you.
